mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file_info (file_name, save_file_name, content_type, delete_flag, create_date, modify_date) VALUES (#{fileName}, #{saveFileName}, #{contentType}, #{deleteFlag}, Now(), Now())
mapper.select: SELECT f.id, f.file_name AS fileName, f.save_file_name AS saveFileName, f.content_type AS contentTyle, f.delete_flag AS deleteFlag FROM reservation_user_comment_image ci INNER JOIN file_info f ON ci.file_id = f.id WHERE ci.id = #{id} AND f.delete_flag = FALSE
